Title: Heroes (2)
Plot:
SG-1 is called into action while a film crew is documenting the Stargate program, but the
S.G.C. comes under investigation after the mission goes terribly wrong.
GuestStars: Julius Chapple, Christopher Redman, Tobias Slezak, Mitchell Kosterman, Saul Rubinek, Adam Baldwin, Robert Picardo, Katey Wright, Jim Byrnes, Christopher Pearce, Christopher Seymour, Mike Desabrais, Terrance Morr
